payload.content: ASML spent a decade developing a $400 million High NA machine in the Netherlands, which is transforming microchip manufacturing.

name: ASML spent a decade developing a $400 million High NA machine in the Netherlands
content: ASML spent a decade developing a $400 million High NA machine in the Netherlands, which is transforming microchip manufacturing.

payload.content: High NA is the latest generation of EUV (Extreme Ultraviolet Lithography) technology, which are the only machines capable of etching nanoscopic blueprints on advanced chips for companies like Intel, TSMC, and Samsung.

name: High NA is the latest generation of EUV (Extreme Ultraviolet Lithography) techno
content: High NA is the latest generation of EUV (Extreme Ultraviolet Lithography) technology, which are the only machines capable of etching nanoscopic blueprints on advanced chips for companies like Intel, TSMC, and Samsung.

payload.content: Only five High NA machines, each the size of a double-decker bus, have been shipped globally so far.

name: Only five High NA machines, each the size of a double-decker bus, have been ship
content: Only five High NA machines, each the size of a double-decker bus, have been shipped globally so far.

payload.content: Without High NA lithography machines, advanced chips cannot be made by companies like Nvidia, Apple, and AMD.

name: Without High NA lithography machines, advanced chips cannot be made by companies
content: Without High NA lithography machines, advanced chips cannot be made by companies like Nvidia, Apple, and AMD.

payload.content: Texas Instruments is constructing a $60 billion U.S. manufacturing megaproject, including seven new fabs in Utah and Texas, to produce U.S.-made chips for customers such as Nvidia and Ford.

name: Texas Instruments is constructing a $60 billion U.S. manufacturing megaproject,
content: Texas Instruments is constructing a $60 billion U.S. manufacturing megaproject, including seven new fabs in Utah and Texas, to produce U.S.-made chips for customers such as Nvidia and Ford.

payload.content: Apple plans to manufacture "critical foundation semiconductors" for iPhones and other devices at Texas Instruments' new U.S. facilities.

name: Apple plans to manufacture "critical foundation semiconductors" for iPhones and
content: Apple plans to manufacture "critical foundation semiconductors" for iPhones and other devices at Texas Instruments' new U.S. facilities.

payload.content: Apple unveiled three new custom microchips in early September, including the A19 Pro SoC with neural accelerators for AI workloads, and the N1 and C1X, which are Apple’s first iPhone networking chip and second-generation iPhone modem, respectively.

name: Apple unveiled three new custom microchips in early September, including the A19
content: Apple unveiled three new custom microchips in early September, including the A19 Pro SoC with neural accelerators for AI workloads, and the N1 and C1X, which are Apple’s first iPhone networking chip and second-generation iPhone modem, respectively.

payload.content: Apple is moving to control all core iPhone chips, replacing parts previously supplied by Broadcom and Qualcomm.

name: Apple is moving to control all core iPhone chips, replacing parts previously sup
content: Apple is moving to control all core iPhone chips, replacing parts previously supplied by Broadcom and Qualcomm.
